items.name: Pandemonium Ward
explicitMods: 2% chance to receive additional Delve items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
5% chance to receive additional Divination Card items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
18% chance in Heists for Jeweller's Orbs to drop as Orbs of Fusing instead
14% increased Rarity of Items dropped in Heists
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this
